name: Blini With Caviar and Yogurt Topping
description: After making these blini, I always have a little of the topping left over; I use it for sandwiches. Don’t use expensive caviar here -- lumpfish is fine.
recipeYield: Enough to top one batch of blini
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons black or red lumpfish caviar

recipeInstructions.text: Place the onion in a bowl and cover with cold water. Let sit for five minutes, then drain and rinse with cold water. Drain on paper towels.
Place the yogurt in a bowl, and stir in the onion, chopped eggs, chives and caviar. Season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate until ready to use.
Warm the blini in a low oven or in a microwave. Top each with a spoonful of the yogurt mixture and serve.
